thread.title: Disney Doodle: Tiana & Lottie Enjoy Disney Beignets
thread.title_full: Disney Doodle: Tiana & Lottie Enjoy Disney Beignets

author: Jennifer Fickley-Baker
title: Disney Doodle: Tiana & Lottie Enjoy Disney Beignets
text:
When artist Ashley Taylor imagined what Tiana and Lottie, gal pals from “ The Princess and the Frog ” would do first if they had the chance to visit Walt Disney World Resort , food was on her mind!
Since Mardi Gras took place earlier this week, it’s only natural that these two New Orleans besties would head to Sassagoula Floatworks and Food Factory at Disney’s Port Orleans – French Quarter to enjoy delicious beignets. Yum! 
And speaking of their beignets, Rachel Bshero shared a recipe earlier this week that takes you step-by-step through how you can make these delicious treats at home .
